This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

commits.message:
Add CODEOWNERS (#205159)

* add CODEOWNERS

* remove reviewer assignments from dependabot config

pull_request.title: Add CODEOWNERS
pull_request.body:
Dependabot will remove the `reviewers` field on May 27, as its logic duplicates the functionality of the `CODEOWNERS` file.
See the following comment as an example: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/205157#issuecomment-2871164239

This PR adds a `CODEOWNERS` file to the repository, which specifies which person/team is responsible for which files. If a PR modifies any of the files listed in this file, GitHub will automatically add the designated person/team as a reviewer to the PR.

Btw, if we add the following line:

```codeowners
*.txt @AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers
```

it means that any changes affecting filters must be reviewed by someone from the filter maintainers team.

Related docs: https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/managing-your-repositorys-settings-and-features/customizing-your-repository/about-code-owners

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

pull_request.title: Upd threads
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

<!--
### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!
-->

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->
`Threads.net` is moving to `Threads.com`.
ref: https://about.fb.com/news/2025/04/new-features-threads-web-experience/

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body: @Alex-302 проблема воспроизводится только в десктопном приложении (в расширении всё корректно работает). И нужно именно зайти на https://uslugi.yandex.ru/ и нажать, например, на Электрика. Так как при переходе по прямой ссылке или перезагрузке страницы проблемы не будет. Это правило вызывает проблему: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/9fa3d4fb5251d7b71a27ba3ab83e56e0f2cd89c1/CyrillicFilters/RussianFilter/sections/antiadblock.txt#L1383-L1384

comment.body:
@DandelionSprout Please take a look.
It seems caused by 
`##div[class*=social-share]:not([preload],[class*=body i],[id*=body i],[class*=content i],[id*=content i],[class*=has-social-share])`

Helps:
`audiofool.reviews#@#div[class*=social-share]:not([preload],[class*=body i],[id*=body i],[class*=content i],[id*=content i],[class*=has-social-share])`

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Hm, according to the code, it should be blocked by a rule below.
```adblock
tripadvisor.*###lithium-root > div[style="bottom: 368px;"]
```
Could you also check it?
```adblock
tripadvisor.*#?##lithium-root > div[style^="bottom:"]:has(> div[class] > h3:contains(/Unlock the best of Tripadvisor|Greifen Sie auf Top-Tipps auf Tripadvisor zu/))
```

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

But for second rule, please also add language related differences. I have checked every single language option on this page, here that need to be **added**

`Accede a lo mejor de Tripadvisor`

`完整享有 Tripadvisor 最好服務`

`解鎖 Tripadvisor 的最佳內容`

`اكتشف أفضل ما على Tripadvisor`

Probably something like that:

```
tripadvisor.*#?##lithium-root > div[style^="bottom:"]:has(> div[class] > h3:contains(/Unlock the best of Tripadvisor|Greifen Sie auf Top-Tipps auf Tripadvisor zu|Accédez au meilleur de Tripadvisor|Acesse o melhor do Tripadvisor|Accede a lo mejor de Tripadvisor|Accedé a lo mejor de Tripadvisor|Scopri il meglio di Tripadvisor|Descubre lo mejor de Tripadvisor|Débloquez le meilleur de Tripadvisor|Lås upp det bästa av Tripadvisor|Krijg toegang tot het beste van Tripadvisor|Tripadvisor’ın en iyilerine erişin|Lås op for det bedste fra Tripadvisor|Nutzen Sie Tripadvisor optimal|Ξεκλειδώστε τα καλύτερα του Tripadvisor|Lås opp det beste av Tripadvisor|Desbloqueie o melhor do Tripadvisor|Используйте все возможности Tripadvisor|旅の情報サイトはこちら|解锁 Tripadvisor 的全部功能|Akses fitur terbaik Tripadvisor|트립어드바이저의 가장 좋은 서비스 이용하기|ปลดล็อกบริการที่ดีที่สุดจาก Tripadvisor|Khám phá điều tuyệt vời nhất của Tripadvisor|完整享有 Tripadvisor 最好服務|解鎖 Tripadvisor 的最佳內容|اكتشف أفضل ما على Tripadvisor|קבל את הטוב ביותר עם Tripadvisor/))
```

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [NSFW] [https://www.1337x.to/sort-search/the%20studio%20flux/time/desc/1/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.1337x.to%2Fsort-search%2Fthe%2520studio%2520flux%2Ftime%2Fdesc%2F1%2F) ### Comment > When visiting websites like 1337x.to, I encounter a persistent issue where clicking anywhere on the page triggers an unwanted pop-up or redirects me to another site. Sometimes, these redirects attempt to download malware or force interactions with deceptive pages. This behaviour makes interacting with the intended website impossible without triggering these unwanted actions. > > Steps to Reproduce: > - Open AdGuard with filtering enabled. > - Navigate to 1337x.to or similar torrent-related websites. > - Attempt to click on any part of the page. > - Observe that a new tab or pop-up appears, sometimes prompting a malware download. > > Expected Behaviour: > AdGuard should block these intrusive pop-ups and prevent malicious redirects. > > Actual Behavior: > The page takeover occurs despite AdGuard being active, allowing unwanted pop-ups and redirects. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/a0ndlrlcf4g8sckscogkk04w80gk80ckehnspk36cg.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.3 (4994) System version: | Edition Windows 11 Pro Version 24H2 Installed on ‎2025-‎03-‎28 OS build 26100.3915 Experience Windows Feature Experience Pack 1000.26100.83.0 Browser: | Edge License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
